summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2002 FORD TAURUS. WHILE THE CONTACT WAS DRIVING AT APPROXIMATELY 20MPH, HE NOTICED A CLUNKING SOUND COMING FROM THE FRONT END OF THE VEHICLE. SHORTLY AFTER, THE FRONT END OF THE VEHICLE SUDDENLY DROPPED TO THE GROUND. THE VEHICLE WAS TOWED TO A LOCAL MECHANIC WHO INFORMED HIM THAT THE FRONT COIL SPRING NEEDED TO BE REPLACED. THE CURRENT AND FAILURE MILEAGES WERE APPROXIMATELY 120,000.
